Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: A higher cumulative incidence of persistent leukocyturia was found in children with an area under the curve > 19 mg / L x h or a peak serum level of indinavir > 12 mg / L .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| leukocyturia |
| indinavir |

Note: "leukocyturia" is a condition characterized by the presence of white blood cells in the urine, and "indinavir" is a drug used to treat HIV infection. Neither "leukocyturia" nor "indinavir" is a disease in the classical sense, but they are both mentioned in the context of disease diagnosis and treatment.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| leukocyturia |

The entity "indinavir" does not clearly refer to a disease, it's a drug used to treat HIV infection, so it's not included in the list of diseases.
